#summary distanceOfTimeInWords(fromTime,toTime[includeSeconds])
#labels chapter,0.9.1

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*:

Pass in two dates to this method and it will return a string describing the approximate time difference between them.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| * fromTime* || date || true ||  || The date to compare from ||
|| * toTime* || date || true ||  || The date to compare to ||
|| *includeSeconds* || boolean || false || false || Set to true for detailed description when the difference is less than one minute ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset aWhileAgo = Now() - 30>
<cfset rightNow = Now()>
<cfoutput>#distanceOfTimeInWords(aWhileAgo, rightNow)#</cfoutput>
}}}



*Related*:
 * [timeAgoInWords timeAgoInWords()]
 * [timeUntilInWords timeUntilInWords()]
